title: Living Guilt Free | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Living Guilt Free | Joel Osteen
description:
You weren’t created to live weighed down by shame and condemnation over your past mistakes. Because of what Jesus did on the cross, you can walk in God’s mercy every day.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
